titleStmt.title: A new little northren song called, Vnder and ouer, ouer and vnder, or a pretty new least, and yet no wonder, or a mayden mistaken, as many now bee, view well this glasse, and you may plainely see To a pretty new northern tune.

notesStmt.note: Printer's and publisher's names and date of publication from STC.
In two parts, printed side by side.
Reproduction of original in the Pepysian Library, Magdalene College, Cambridge, England.
